document.title: SSA-327980:  Vulnerabilities in RUGGEDCOM ROX I

notes.title: Summary
notes.text:
RUGGEDCOM ROX I-based devices are affected by several vulnerabilities which could
potentially allow attackers to perform actions with administrative privileges.
Siemens recommends specific countermeasures to mitigate the vulnerabilities in ROX I
devices. Siemens will update this advisory when new information becomes available.
AFFECTED PRODUCTS
Â· RUGGEDCOM ROX I: All versions
DESCRIPTION
RUGGEDCOM ROX-based VPN endpoints and firewall devices are used to connect devices
that operate in harsh environments such as electric utility substations and traffic control
cabinets.
Detailed information about the vulnerabilities is provided below.
